title: Impact of Canadian purchases of Mexican fin assets

content.question: Assume that Canadian consumers increase their demand for Mexican financial assets How would the international supply of Canadian dollars, the value of the Mexican peso relative to the Canadian dollar, and Canadian net exports to Mexico change?

choices.label:
Supply of Canadian Dollars
 Value of the Peso
 Canadian Net Exports

Increase
 Increase
 Increase

No change

content.answer:
Supply of Canadian Dollars
 Value of the Peso
 Canadian Net Exports

Increase
 Increase
 Increase

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports
